com.mlt.desktop.control

Class OptionPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Pane
        • com.mlt.desktop.control.OptionPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PopupMenuProvider

    public class OptionPane
extends Pane
implements PopupMenuProvider
    A pane to layout options (buttons) either horizontally or vertically.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
